__BEGIN_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
{
  "routine": {
    "id": 101,
    "name": "Weekday evening: set FR station backlights on DFON",
    "parent": 0,
    "comment": "When a station is physically fast-on during weekday evenings, ensure backlight is raised and persisted.",
    "if": [
      { "(": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "3C 3E 36 5", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "3C 3E 36 6", "control": "DFON" } },
        { "or": 1 },
        { "==": { "device": "3C 3E 36 7", "control": "DFON" } },
      { ")": 1 },
      { "and": 1 },
      { "weekly": { "days": "mon,tue,wed,thu,fri", "from": { "time": "18:00", "to": { "time": "22:00" } } } }
    ],
    "then": [
      { "device": "3C 3E 36 5", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 120, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "3C 3E 36 5", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "3C 3E 36 6", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 120, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "3C 3E 36 6", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] },
      { "device": "3C 3E 36 7", "command": "BL", "parameters": [ { "name": "n/a", "value": 120, "uom": "25", "precision": 0 } ] },
      { "device": "3C 3E 36 7", "command": "WDU", "parameters": [] }
    ],
    "else": [],
    "reasoning": "Group COC events for DFON across the three stations, limit to weekday evenings with a weekly schedule, then set each station's backlight to a visible level and persist the change with WDU. Actions target all stations to ensure consistent state regardless of which one was physically controlled."
  }
}
__END_NUCORE_ROUTINE__
